de99563b-3d04-48b0-98fa-afbd32b15dde.content: Implemented GraphRAG federated qualitative assessor contract v1 with deterministic scoring, local model consensus, guardrail caps, schema, and tests; benchmark query invocation fixed and profile outputs persisted.

eb3f1761-2dfd-4a53-841b-e0a0caf1f38a.content: Manual verification of GraphRAG sweep on 2026-02-19 found qwen_0_5b returned grounded answer while llama_3_2_1b produced non-informative query output; judge-pathology issue identified where llama judge emitted all-zero scores even in high-confidence deterministic contexts.
